body.p: Touching the “User” button icon on the Home Screen displays the “User” screen.

The Users Screen display show many Users are active and provides for the Administrator to set up new users and their level of access to the switch. Each user will be assigned a Password and PIN #. The Administrator is the only user allowed access to setup Names, Pins, Passwords, and Class. The arrow keys on the right side of the screen allow the Administrator to select the user to be set up or modified. Then by using one of the four icons below, the Name, PIN, password and Class can beset through the use of the either the Keyboard or Numeric Screen.
